categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starship classes

nodes.text: The Hammerhead Scout Corvette was a model of Sphyrna-class Hammerhead corvette used by the fleet of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. It was equipped with at least two laser cannons and three engines, and served in the capacity of a scout ship. During the Galactic Civil War, one Hammerhead Scout Corvette confronted an Imperial II-class Star Destroyer.
